top_comments.comment: Looks like some kind of crazy chalk cliffs. Love it

I absolutely love Ren's intros. I think it just might be my favourite yter intro.
It just gets me so hyped for the episode!

comments_since_last_sample.body: Hey Rendog, as someone who lives in New York where there are bright advertisements on many buildings. I should give a word of advice. The color of the big sign should contrast the surrounding environment- or Hermits may not even realize it is a sign!!!

Hi Ren - the problem is they can't see the freakin barrel.  I've watched a few of them struggle to find it because it's covered with item frames also making it tricky to click on.  Remove the item frames - problem solved.  They all see the sign.
I never even seen this on my feed so I only just now got to watch it
